definition: albuterol, chemical used in treating asthma
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
uncle/father's younger brother/husband's younger brother/Taiwan pr. [shu2]
alcohol/wine with high alcohol content/rich/pure/good wine/sterols
